Powell was not duped or misled by anybody," Donald Rumsfeld writes. nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Chrysler, which popularized minivans in 1983 under former CEO Lee Iacocca , will" rethink" the minivan to make it more versatile, Sergio Marchionne said. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made. A fresh architecture for a new generation of minivans will be introduced in 2013 or 2014,

While Paula Abdul may still bash Simon Cowell , it sounds like a classic love/hate relationship Live To Dance, which returned Paula Abdul to her first love of dance. I'm overwhelmed by the whole process but it's been a labor of love from the moment I came on board. I had a vision that I wanted to produce and it's finally here. It's out there. I'm doing it and it's been fun mentoring the acts. They are all so diverse. It's been lovely. Last week, the audience was treated to clips of Paula Abdul mentoring all of the semi-finalists and giving them tips on their dancing.
